Question
========
What feature lets Julia define different methods for different types?

Answerlist
----------
* Multiple dispatch
* Garbage collection
* Bytecode
* Vectorization only

Solution
========
Multiple dispatch selects methods based on argument types.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
